mapper.select:
SELECT facedb.id, facedb.name, facedb.model, facedb.type, facedbType.enumName AS typeName, facedb.remark, facedb.facedb_id AS facedbId, facedb.create_time AS createTime, facedb.create_user AS createUser, facedb.update_time AS updateTime, facedb.update_user AS updateUser, facedb.delete_time AS deleteTime, facedb.delete_user AS deleteUser, facedb.delete_flag AS deleteFlag FROM ss_facedb_info facedb LEFT JOIN cw_base_enum facedbType ON facedbType.enumType = 'FACEDB_TYPE' AND facedb.type = facedbType.enumValue
facedb.delete_flag = '0'
AND facedb.model = #{model}
AND facedb.type = #{type}
AND FIND_IN_SET(facedb.type,#{types})
AND facedb.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY facedb.name
